page.shortlink: api client api a5 u element toggle method

argument.name: element
argument.description: A pointer to a DOM element or the ID of an element.

property.name: type
property.description: Animation type. Can be one of the following properties: 'none', 'fade', 'slide', 'blind', 'clip', 'drop', 'explode', 'fold', 'puff', 'scale', 'size', or 'pulsate'.

property.name: duration
property.description: The duration of the animation in milliseconds.

property.name: onComplete
property.description: Function to call when the show/hide is complete.

page.description: Toggle the display of an element.

discussion.p: Animation can be specified by passing in animation settings. Animation uses jQuery, if the jQuery library is not available, a plain show/hide will be done. If different animation wants to be used for show and hide, the animation settings object can consist of two properties "show" and "hide" which should have the standard animation settings in them.
